name: What the Dog Doing?
description:
What the Dog Doing?  is a 2D attention-seeking simulator.  In this game, the player plays the role of a dog that recently got into Safe Haven adoption center. The goal is to catch the eyes of the customers in order to be adopted! There is another dog in the shelter, her name is Vicious. She is small and fluffy but she is a deadly competition. You must try your best to impress the humans and try to get adopted first! 

Controls

Pressing different buttons to perform multiple actions

- Roll on the floor, put paws on the fence, Do baby doll eyes, Play Fetch, Bark, or not do anything! 

The Customers 

There are three types of customers, a young girl, an adult man, and an elder man.  Each customer has their preferences, they might like or dislike a specific dog action. When a customer's happiness is completely filled, he/she will adopt you! 

Adoption Paper

Once you've been chosen, you will hear a sparkly sound as the heart fills to the top, you will be able to sign adoption paperwork, you will get your very own certificate!
